Class BankAccount

java.lang.Object
  BankAccount

public class BankAccount
extends java.lang.Object

BankAccount class models a simple bank account. Each account has a unique account number, as well as a customer name and current balance. COMP 1451 lab 3 -- there are a number of deliberate bugs in the project.

Version:
July 2007
Author:
Colleen Penrowley
